title: Ever Since Release of Alpha, Busplat/Data Corruption
body:
So ever since the release of the Alpha Client, I've had multiple instances where the champion select would end and the client would attempt to enter the loading screen. Either just before entering the loading screen or just after entering the loading screen, the game crashes with a bug splat error. Upon trying to reconnect it crashes again. After logging out and logging back in the message "Data corruption detected.... we will repair the installation now"

After it finishes the repair I am able to rejoin the game.

replies.body: Are you running the Alpha client when this happens?
